japanese:
（一花はどこだ？
　待ち合わせはここのはずだが……）
translation:
(Where's Ichika?
 We're supposed to meet here...)

japanese:
フータローくーん！
こっち！　こっちだよー！
translation:
Futaro-kuuun!
Here! Over here!

japanese: ああ、すまん、遅れたか？
translation: Hey, sorry, am I late?

japanese:
ううん、私もいま来たところ。
気にしなくていいよ。
translation:
No, I just got here too.
Don't worry about it.

japanese:
会うのは久しぶりだね。
フータロー君は、戻ってからはなにしてたの？
translation:
It's been a while.
What have you been up to since we've been back?

japanese: たまってる課題を片付けてた。
translation: Dealt with study problems that had piled up.

japanese:
うわ、予想通りすぎる……。
せっかくの夏休みなのに、もったいないなぁ。
translation:
Wow, it's EXACTLY as I imagined...
Even though it's our summer break.
What a waste.

japanese:
いや、島で充分に遊んだから
別にもったいなくもないと思うが。
translation:
Well, I played enough on the island,
so it's not really a waste at all.

japanese:
お前も、始業式直前になって焦る前に、
ちょっとずつでも終わらせておけよ？
translation:
You can finish yours if you do a little bit
at a time, before you end up rushing through them
right before the opening ceremony, can't you?

japanese:
ストップ！　課題や勉強の話はここまで！
今日は別の用件で来てもらったんだから。
translation:
Stop! We're DONE talking about problems and studies.
I brought you out here for something else today.

japanese:
あ、ああ、そうだったな。
つい口に出ちまった。
translation:
O-oh, is that so.
It just kinda slipped out.

japanese:
そういう、心配性で面倒見がいいところは
相変わらずだね。
translation:
That caring, worrying part of you,
it hasn't changed, has it.

japanese:
さて、それでは、今日来てもらった本題に
入りたいと思いまーす。
translation:
Alright, now I'd like to talk to you
about the reason I had you come here today.

japanese: じゃーん、これなーんだ？
translation: Tah-dah, what's this?

japanese:
……アルバム？
と言うことは、もしかして。
translation:
...An album?
Which means.

japanese:
そう、完成したの。
みんなの想い出のアルバム。
translation:
That's right, it's done.
Everyone's memorial album.

japanese:
そうか！
さっそく見せてもらっていいか？
translation:
That's right!
Can I look at it, now?

japanese:
もちろん。
そのために来てもらったんだから。
translation:
Sure.
That's why I brought it.

japanese:
みんなの写真、ノーカット、ノー編集だから
結構なボリュームになったんだ。
translation:
These pictures of everyone haven't been cut or edited,
so there's a lot to go through.

japanese:
おお、どれもよく撮れてる。
最近のスマホは本当に性能がいいんだな。
translation:
Ooh, everyone's photo is taken so well.
Recent smartphones are really so capable.

japanese:
ええ～？　感想そこなの？
もっと、みんな生き生きといい表情してる、とか
そういう方向で行こうよ。
translation:
Huh? That's what you're impressed by?
Let's talk more about, well,
everyone's lively expressions, stuff like that.

japanese: 焦るな、第一印象を言っただけだろ。
translation: Don't get hasty, I only gave my first impression.

japanese:
しかし、いつの間に撮ったのかっていう写真も
結構あるな。
translation:
However, there are quite a few photos
where it's like, when was THAT taken?

japanese:
見ろよ、これなんか隙だらけで面白いぞ。
四葉がとんでもない顔をしてる。
translation:
Look, it's funny 'cause it's just in this little gap.
Yotsuba's face is something else.

japanese:
あはは、本当だよね。
ちなみに、こっちの二乃もなかなかだよ？
translation:
Hahaha, you're right.
Nino here is pretty out there, as well.

japanese:
くくっ！
これはいいな、まさにありのままだ。
translation:
Teehee!
That's good. It really captures how she is.

japanese:
うん、これなら、いつ見返したとしても、
島でのことが思い浮かんで、懐かしさと笑いが
あふれてきそうだよね。
translation:
Yeah, with this, no matter when we think back on it,
we'll remember our time on the island,
and we'll be filled with nostalgia and laughter.

japanese:
ああ。
ここには間違いなく、色あせない想い出が
しっかりと刻まれているな。
translation:
Yeah.
There are definitely memories that will never fade
engraved in these photos.

japanese:
よかった。
フータロー君にそう言ってもらえて。
translation:
Good.
I'm happy you said that, Futaro-kun.

japanese:
しかし、確かにボリュームがあるな。
最後はどんな写真にしたんだ？
translation:
However, there ARE quite a lot of pictures.
What pictures did you use last?

japanese: おっと、見ちゃう？
translation: Oh, are you gonna take a peek?

japanese:
……ん？　んんんん！？
な、なんだこりゃ！？
translation:
...Hm? HMMMMMM?!
WH-WHAT THE HELL IS THIS?!

japanese: なんでしょう？
translation: What now?

japanese:
なんでアルバムの最後が俺の寝顔なんだよ！？
というか、いつ撮った！
translation:
Why is the last photo in the album my sleeping face?!
And when the hell was it taken?!

japanese:
さて、いつだったかな～？
わかんないな～。
translation:
Hm, I wonder when?
I just don't know.

japanese:
掲載不許可だ！
その写真は破棄しろ！
translation:
You're not allowed to use that in the album!
Destroy that photo, now!

japanese:
それはズルくない？
二乃や四葉はありままの写真を載せてるのに。
translation:
Isn't that a little sneaky to do something like that?
Even though there are pictures of Yotsuba and Nino
as they are.

japanese:
ぐっ……。
そ、それは……だが……。
translation:
Urk...
Th-that's...well...

japanese:
仕方ないなぁ。
じゃあ、特別に、この写真は
私だけの秘密にしてあげよう。
translation:
It can't be helped.
Alright, then I'll take this picture out
as our little secret.

japanese: あ、ああ、そうしてくれると……ありがたいんだが。
translation: O-okay, if you do that...I'd be thankful.

japanese:
アルバムには載せないで……
私の胸の中だけにしまっておくよ。
translation:
I won't put in the album...
I'll lock it away, safe in my heart.

japanese: だから……私だけのフータロー君だよ。
translation: That way...it'll be only MY little Futaro-kun.

japanese: なーんて、ね。
translation: Just kidding!
